summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3872 for the improvement of 35th Avenue South, from a point 40 feet south of Holgate Street to Irving Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47332, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
